name: Totems Of Time
description:
(We Recommend downloading the executable version instead of playing it on WEBGL)

Totems of Time is a 3D puzzle game where the player is trapped on a stranded island. The main concept of the game revolves around the primary game mechanics where the player can time travel back to the past to solve certain puzzles that otherwise cannot be solved in present.

Credit:

  • Nikolas Abraham - Level & UI Design
  • Mavis Zhou - Program
  • Jason Xu - Art
  • Aditya Mawlankar - Program
